columns.Description: Date and time when the record was generated
columns.Name: Timestamp

columns.Description: Application that performed the recorded action
columns.Name: Application

columns.Description: Unique identifier for the application
columns.Name: ApplicationId

columns.Description: Type of logon session, specifically interactive, remote interactive (RDP), network, batch, and service
columns.Name: LogonType

columns.Description: Information about the Microsoft Entra ID endpoint that the request was sent to and the type of request sent during sign in
columns.Name: EndpointCall

columns.Description: Contains the error code if a sign-in error occurs. To find a description of a specific error code, visit https://aka.ms/AADsigninsErrorCodes
columns.Name: ErrorCode

columns.Description: Unique identifier of the sign-in event
columns.Name: CorrelationId

columns.Description: Unique number assigned to a user by a website's server for the duration of the visit or session
columns.Name: SessionId

columns.Description: Name displayed in the address book entry for the account user. This is usually a combination of the given name, middle initial, and surname of the user.
columns.Name: AccountDisplayName

columns.Description: Unique identifier for the account in Microsoft Entra ID
columns.Name: AccountObjectId

columns.Description: User principal name (UPN) of the account
columns.Name: AccountUpn

columns.Description: Indicates whether a user inside the network does not belong to the organization’s domain
columns.Name: IsExternalUser

columns.Description: Indicates whether the user that signed in is a guest in the tenant
columns.Name: IsGuestUser

columns.Description: On-premises user principal name (UPN) of the user signing in to Microsoft Entra ID
columns.Name: AlternateSignInName

columns.Description: Date and time when the user that signed in last changed their password
columns.Name: LastPasswordChangeTimestamp

columns.Description: Display name of the resource accessed. The display name can contain any character.
columns.Name: ResourceDisplayName

columns.Description: Unique identifier of the resource accessed
columns.Name: ResourceId

columns.Description: Unique identifier of the tenant of the resource accessed
columns.Name: ResourceTenantId

columns.Description: Fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the device
columns.Name: DeviceName

columns.Description: Unique identifier for the device in Microsoft Entra ID
columns.Name: AadDeviceId

columns.Description: Platform of the operating system running on the device. This indicates specific operating systems, including variations within the same family, such as Windows 10 and Windows 7
columns.Name: OSPlatform

columns.Description: Indicates the trust type of the device that signed in. For managed device scenarios only. Possible values are Workplace, AzureAd, and ServerAd.
columns.Name: DeviceTrustType

columns.Description: Indicates whether the endpoint has been onboarded to and is managed by Microsoft Defender for Endpoint
columns.Name: IsManaged

columns.Description: Indicates whether the device that initiated the event is compliant or not
columns.Name: IsCompliant

columns.Description: Details about the authentication processor
columns.Name: AuthenticationProcessingDetails

columns.Description: Type of authentication required for the sign-in. Possible values: multiFactorAuthentication (MFA was required) and singleFactorAuthentication (no MFA was required).
columns.Name: AuthenticationRequirement

columns.Description: Indicates if the token issuer is Microsoft Entra ID (0) or Active Directory Federation Services (1)
columns.Name: TokenIssuerType

columns.Description: Aggregated risk level during sign-in. Possible values: 0 (aggregated risk level not set), 1 (none), 10 (low), 50 (medium), or 100 (high).
columns.Name: RiskLevelAggregated

columns.Description: User risk level at sign-in
columns.Name: RiskLevelDuringSignIn

columns.Description: Array of risk event types applicable to the event
columns.Name: RiskEventTypes

columns.Description: Indicates risky user state. Possible values: 0 (none), 1 (confirmed safe), 2 (remediated), 3 (dismissed), 4 (at risk), or 5 (confirmed compromised).
columns.Name: RiskState

columns.Description: User agent information from the web browser or other client application
columns.Name: UserAgent

columns.Description: Indicates the client app used
columns.Name: ClientAppUsed

columns.Description: Details about the version of the browser used to sign in
columns.Name: Browser

columns.Description: Details of the conditional access policies applied to the sign-in event
columns.Name: ConditionalAccessPolicies

columns.Description: Status of the conditional access policies applied to the sign-in. Possible values are 0 (policies applied), 1 (attempt to apply policies failed), or 2 (policies not applied).
columns.Name: ConditionalAccessStatus

columns.Description: IP address assigned to the device during communication
columns.Name: IPAddress

columns.Description: Country/Region where the account user is located
columns.Name: Country

columns.Description: State where the sign-in occurred, if available
columns.Name: State

columns.Description: City where the client IP address is geolocated
columns.Name: City

columns.Description: The north to south coordinates of the sign-in location
columns.Name: Latitude

columns.Description: The east to west coordinates of the sign-in location
columns.Name: Longitude

columns.Description: Network location details of the authentication processor of the sign-in event
columns.Name: NetworkLocationDetails

columns.Description: Unique identifier of the request
columns.Name: RequestId

columns.Description: Unique identifier for the event
columns.Name: ReportId
